name: QpThread C++ Library
short_description:
This is a fork of the QpThread C++ library that was originally written by Pavel Krauz and published on http://lin.fsid.cvut.cz/~kra

This library provides object oriented framework in C++ for threads and Unix signals on top of POSIX Threads.
